messages.content: What are the airports mentioned in the text?
What is the main goal of combining formal syntax and semantic knowledge in multi-agent systems?
to ensure that distributed agents execute tasks deterministically and efficiently
What is the result of using a combination of formal syntax and semantic knowledge in multi-agent systems?
What are the two new architectural layers proposed in the paper?
an Agent Communication Layer (L8) and an Agent Semantic Negotiation Layer (L9)
What is the main focus of the Internet of Agents in the context of the paper?
the addition of semantics and syntax of modern multipurpose DSLs into agent interactions
